Section A

Cookie loves to chase squirrels and oddly I hate standard Lorem Ipsum. So am rambling on my own in regular English not Latin, because I don't know Latin. Though, I've heard Latin is a excellent language for better understanding English. But I don't know. I do like and know a bit of Japanese and Spanish.
